page.title: 07The School. Middleton. (2)
page.content: The School is a Victorian building constructed of local{carstone}and opened in 1859. There have been various more recent brick extensions including inside toilets to replace the outside ones which were in use until about ten years ago. There is a separate wooden classroom put up in 1950 and also one mobile classroom which has made it possible to turn one of the original classrooms into a hall. There is a hard playground area with climbing frames and the school has its own{playing field}which contains a running track and pitches for football and rounders . The School's equipment includes some indoor gym apparatus and three {computers.
